Name: Stone and Contracts
Title: Contract of Eons Unshaken
Desc: "This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

Talent.Name: Stone and Contracts
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase of the next Round begins:</color> Create 3 $[K411] and draw 1 card.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3402}Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
